checkArgumentsCorrectness

public abstract void checkArgumentsCorrectness(HttpRestHandler handler,
                                               String uri,
                                               com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode arguments,
                                               com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode result)
                                        throws HttpIncorrectRequestException
Check the arguments correctness, called before any BODY elements but after URI and HEADER. Note that ARG_METHOD is only set from current request. It might be also set from URI or HEADER and therefore should be done in this method through
